This reminds me! Jen contacted me and told me that she has a new comp now and will return either today or tomorrow.

Also, I managed to digitally patch up my hard drive a bit, so it semi-works. I'm able to post now though.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> ::Decadel::
> 
>       Decadel arrived at Maximal City.
> 
>       "........Autoguns......" Decadel said to himself.
> 
>       He transformed to sea-worm mode, and dug deep underground, then popped up at the entrance, and made a dash inside Maximal City.
> 
>       "Exterior defenses outwitted...." Decadel complimented himself.
> 
>       Fortunately, for Decadel's sake, he erased all remains and signatures and stuff of being a Predacon.  He hated Predacons.  He hated all the factions out their, really.  Decadel would fake being a Maximal.  He walked around, looking for somebody to greet him........Whether they would welcome him warmly like a long-lost friend, or tell him to fuck off, would determine how much he hated them, and how long till he used one of his worms to enslave somebody....
> 
>        "Hello?  Anybody here?  Can somebody please tell me what faction this is and stuff?" Decadel asked aloud, waiting to see if anybody heard him and would come.
> 
> 
>
